issue.title: Erratic vehicle behavior when breaks are applied and when accelerating

content.raw: Can you test with the polaris model I just added in [gazebo_models branch polaris_min_depth](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/commits/b0cf47bed29fd692f8a2fd5c77147447d52a7d4b)? I thought I had fixed the intermittent wheel contact issues, but I made the min_depth parameter non-zero so that should improve things.
